amendment.description: Amendment requires GAO to conduct a study on the impact of the nation's bankruptcy rate due to the extension of credit to students enrolled in post-secondary education programs who are claimed as dependents for tax purposes by their parents or legal guardians.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 as printed in House report 105-573 to direct the Comptroller General to conduct a study of the impact on the nation's bankruptcy rate due to the extension of credit to students enrolled in post-secondary education programs who are claimed as dependents for tax purposes by their parents or legal guardians.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Baldacci amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
